data.title: Vice President, Bluepoint Leadership Development
data.meta_description:
Current Position and Past Experience
David Parks is Vice President, Client Service at Bluepoint Leadership Development, a company he co-founded in 2004 focusing purely on leadership development, communications and coaching.

Prior to this, Parks was the West Coast Regional Director for the Tom Peters Company, where he worked for eight years. His position with the Tom Peters Company came on the heels of four years that Parks was a Business Development Senior Executive with FFI Hammersmith in London, England.

Education, Honors and Achievements
Parks earned his degree in Business Studies from Northumbria University in 1985. He earned his DMS in Management from the University of Teesside in 1986.

Personal Details and Community Involvement
Outside of work Parks enjoys participating in triathlons and century bike rides. He volunteers time for educational and field trip projects with his kid’s elementary school.

Connect
You can find Parks on Twitter @davidparks.
data.text:
